about.title: About Us
about.missionText: Our mission is to connect people with non-governmental organizations (NGOs) that are making a positive impact in the world. We believe that everyone can contribute to making the world a better place, and we want to facilitate that process.
about.whoText: We are a team of developers and designers passionate about creating technology that has a positive social impact. Our platform is designed to make collaboration with NGOs more accessible and transparent for everyone.
about.valueTransparencyText: We believe in full transparency in how NGOs operate and how donations are used.
about.valueAccessibilityText: We work to make volunteering and donations accessible to everyone, regardless of their location or resources.
about.valueImpactText: We focus on maximizing the positive impact our users can have through their engagement with NGOs.
